this_title: After Nonoy Estarte, A Certain Orpheus, And Those Flowers In Dahilayan That Accompanied This Other Sense They Told Me About
introduction: Inspired by an artist's drawings in the South, I saw paintings that depicted the indigenous people's view of the origins of the world. The film is the tale of our nation and basic things: water, plants, body, and their own interaction through time.
chinese_title: After Nonoy Estarte, A Certain Orpheus, And Those Flowers In Dahilayan That Accompanied This Other Sense They Told Me About
